markdownRemark.html:
This could be easy as someone suppouse, but how to insert this kind of opertaion elegantly without overhead of preparing views' presenter?

<table class="table">
            <thead>
                <tr>
                    <th scope="col">Product</th>
                    <th scope="col">User</th>
                    <th scope="col">Range</th>
                    <th scope="col">Message</th>
                    <th scope="col">Status</th>
                    <th scope="col">Actions</th>
                </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody>
                @foreach($products as $product)
                @php ($first = true) @endphp
                    @foreach($product->reservations as $reservation)
                        @if($first == true)
                            <td rowspan="{{$product->reservations->count()}}"> {{$product->name}} </td>
                        @php ($first = false) @endphp
                        @endif
                            <td> {{ $reservation->user->name}} </td>
                            <td>Range</td>
                            <td> {{ $reservation->message}} </td>
                            <td> {{ $reservation->status}} </td>
                            <td> <button class="btn btn-primary">Aktion</button> </td>
                        </tr>
                    @endforeach
                @endforeach
            </tbody>
        </table>
